laboratory_examinations.findings: WBC: 2.6 K/μL, Hb: 8 gm/dL, Platelet: 79 × 10^3/uL; results indicate pancytopenia.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Initial test showed persistent pancytopenia; specific changes over time not detailed.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Marked hypocellularity of 25% with no megakaryocytes, granulocyte 41%, erythroid precursors 51%, lymphocytes 8%, no abnormal cellular collection seen, no evidence of myelodysplastic syndrome or malignancy.
Revealed three copies of chromosome X in all metaphases examined.

laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Myelodysplastic syndrome/bone marrow failure FISH panel genetic testing
laboratory_examinations.findings: An uncertain variant in two genes associated with bone marrow failure; clinical significance unknown.
Did not match any family members.
